website_summaries.verdict: This popular letter board offers helpful accessories alongside an attractive tripod stand.
pros: Product also has a built-in wall mount for customers who prefer it to hang
Letter-sorting tray and pouch keep everything organized
cons: Some owners reported the included stand breaking over time

customer_reviews.title: ALOT of missing letters
customer_reviews.text: I’m REALLY annoyed I didn’t get all the letters in the biggest size. I am missing the letters: M, N, O, P, Q, S! And only got numbers 1 and 7. someone was supposed to send me the rest of the letters but never followed through.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Best quality!  Really very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this product! The packaging was amazing, the quality of the board is superb, and the letters and letter packaging is just perfect! I would highly recommend purchasing this product if you are in the need of a letter board
customer_reviews.author: Nicole - Sew Much Moore

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to leave a 5 stars review. It's a nice Felt Board, but reporting to the the price and the quality, I would rather recommend the Felt Letter Board from Otitano. Here is the link, in case you want to take a look:
customer_reviews.author: Gantexcom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. I’m so disappointed with this. Letters come cut but not well and they’re so jumbled it’s obnoxious. The sizes in theory are great but the quantity of letters is crap. The 93 2” letters. I have no A,B,C, no X,Y,Z and none of many in between. I couldn’t think of one phrase, even a short phrase, for fall that I had all the large letters for. The letters also like to fall out. This is my first letterboard so I have no comparison but I’m kinda over it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! Packaged beautifully and I was amazed at how much it came with for the price. The box to store the abundance of letters is about 8”x10” and makes organizing a breeze (if you’re into that sort of thing). It also comes with cursive days of the week and months, along with a pouch to store those in as well. My only qualm is with the stand for the felt board, which is seems very flimsy, but obviously it’s not intended to support anything except this light board so I think it will hold up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jan GLL

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It's the year 2020, and you only get a single big number 2. So I had to go buy a separate letters/numbers set as soon as I got this one. In addition the box it came in was almost falling apart, the box they give you to store the letters won't latch, and you have to trim half the letters or there will be horrible little plastic pieces hanging off. It only got a second star because I like the board itself.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Found a hair in it
customer_reviews.text: There was a long black hair in the letters. Which I found while sorting them all out. Picture of the hair and of the sorting process. Pretty gross honestly. No one in my house has black hair so it wasn’t from us. Other than that... I did not need scissors to get started however you do have to sort all the pieces as others have mentioned. A little confusing that you have to do that given you receive a card with a key to how it is organized. But I guess that’s just a suggestion.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrica Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of this board and everything that it came with but... You get what ya pay for. As you can see in the pictures attached, the felt lines were crooked with the frame and some of the corners on the frame where the wood meet looked like the material was chipped, making it look really cheap. Definitely returned this item. I tried contacting the company that left their email in the package and the email was immediately sent back saying that it wasn't a valid email... Seems kinda scammy to me.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Clearly wasn't inspected before shipped out. False advertisement. Not like pictures
customer_reviews.text: The words are dirty and just gross. Didn't come in the plastic box organized. Came in some wood box..... No black letters which is one reason I ordered this set.... ALL white letters The letterbard itself is not made well. The felt is coming up in places as you can see in the photo. A card in the box said to email them before leaving a negative review and I tried but it isn't delivering because it is an email that doesn't accept email or doesn't exist... So here I am leaving it as a review since this is awful... Cute idea but the letters being gross was the first thing I noticed when I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: The R’s

customer_reviews.title: Very Crappy
customer_reviews.text: The stand is obviously VERY crooked!! One side is @ an inch & the other side is only @ 1/2 inch!! Also did not come with the lil scissors to cut off the excess plastic. I tried emailing as per their card inside to give them a chance to make it right, but the email address came back as not found & I double checked to make sure it was right.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin L Miller

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, storage has flaws.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this letter board and all the accessories that come with it. It looks really nice and comes with tons of letters and numbers and symbols. The only downfall is that if you organize the storage box the way they designed, you have way too many symbols and numbers to fit in the designated spots so you won't be able to shut the box. It's a little annoying because now I either need to put the symbols in with certain letters or put them in a separate baggy and hope they don't get lost. Overall it's a small problem and I would absolutely recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It might not be the product for you.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the letter board and received it the very next, which was awesome! The packaging is very nice and I love that the letters come in an organizer box. The board itself is beautiful and sturdy. However, the letters seem to fall off quite often. The easel is low quality but I can fix it up myself. It doesn’t match the color of the wood on the letter board and I can stain it. It also needs a good sanding. I was initially impressed with the product. I’m not a fan of continuously fixing the letters, though.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust the description! You will have more work!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set since it advertised the letters organized in a container for you already. What a joke! I received the wooden box with the tiles inside, and as soon as I opened it I realized that the tiles were literally thrown into the sections randomly. However, I did provide one star for the fact that the big and small letters were separated, so nicely done! There is a key even provided to tell you which letters are where. Total lie! I actually think this will take me more time than the old system I was using. What a pain!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Crappy stand. Pain to break apart and file down ...
customer_reviews.text: Crappy stand . Pain to break apart and file down all the letters . Arrived with weak/broken stand and when I tried to place board on it it totally collapsed and broke. Now I wasted all that time breaking apart the letters for nothing . Have tried to email company repeatedly with no reply. Great. Photo of cracked stand and odd flat angle it sits at.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hoover

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: For my birthday, a friend gave me a letter board that she got at Target. She mentioned that she would love to also have a letter board, so when her birthday rolled around a few weeks after mine, I took to Amazon (because I'm lazy and can't be bothered to actually go into a store; don't @ me, I know you're the same way). I'll be giving her the board this weekend, but just from looking at it, I can tell that it's great. I know she'll be thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christy A. Risher

customer_reviews.title: Lots of letters and numbers
customer_reviews.text: I like this board... comes with a nice clear organizer. I also like that it comes with a lot of letter, numbers and special characters in different sizes. Maybe there’s way more than needed but not complaining about that. Two things I want to complain tho, the small letters don’t stay and tend to fall off. When I received this in the mail, the box was not packaged in another box—so when I got this at my front door, it was all beaten up and corners were ripped. But the actual product wasn’t damaged so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: MISSH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful letter board
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I received this board in the most adorable box, with everything perfectly displayed upon opening. The company had a thank you note inside, with instructions and an email to contact if you have any issues with the product. I love the different sizes of letter! And there are a bunch of symbols and little pictures to use as well! The board is perfect, and had a great stand to use with it. The box of letters is exactly what I was looking for to keep it all organized. I would absolutely order this again for myself or a gift. You wont be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: wife

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit but disorganized.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice packaging that’s very giftable. I had to take away a star because the organizer did not come organized, and there weren’t consistent quantities of each letter. For example, the large letters had 6 i’s but 1 j, k, q, v, x, z. I get that some letters are used less often, but one piece of a letter seems scarce. Further, the box layout did not match the layout on the suggested organizational chart. The sizes of each divider didn’t match so I ended up drawing my own chart.
customer_reviews.author: akosaurus

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this board, and wanted to love it, but a few things prevented that. The plastic box the letters are in arrived cracked in the corner. No broken plastic was in the box and the box was undamaged, so it was obviously cracked before being packaged. Additionally, the scissors that come with it fell apart twice so I gave up using them. Also, the tail that holds the letters in place on the board are VERY short and some of mine kept falling so I have to gently move it once it’s all in place so it doesn’t mess up. Overall, it’s usable, but not as convenient and user friendly as I’d hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! more than just a sign
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised to open a cute travel box that is reusable and storeable. then it gets better. It has a little wood box to hold all the letters, numbers, etc and has the months written out. Maybe i missed all this detail on the description but fantastic!! actual sign just as described. VERY PLEASED with this purchase. I have another sign like this from a different company and don't use as much due to issues of the numbers, letters, etc. this system makes it easier to get all together.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect for Instagram
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a puppy, and like every millennial, made my puppy an IG. I thought getting this felt board would be the perfect way to do those weekly/monthly eventually yearly age boards. I chose this particular board over others becuase the majority of the letters are pre-cut. And there are 3 sizes, AND it comes with a letter organizer. I eventually will buy colored letters I'm sure. I've also decided to weekly put up a funny quote to set up behind me for all my WFH Zoom calls! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Missyeru

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheap....get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Things that were decent: felt letter board. Things that were cheap/low quality: frame around felt board is rough, easel will fall over if you don't place the back arm in just the right position, organizing box had a flimsy clear film over the top, plastic letters had little nubs at the bottom that should have been trimmed. The box that came was made of what feels like balsa wood but the product page for this item shows a clear plastic organizer. That was disappointing. Other notes: The actual letters came pre-trimmed but there was a sheet of words (months/days of the week) that were not trimmed. I wish the easel was the same color as the frame.
customer_reviews.author: K. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decor!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! It adds a nice rustic, farmhouse style to my home decor. I use it to adorn my houseplants in our living space, and it is just beautiful. I like that it came in nice packaging with a thoughtful note from the sender. My only complaint would be that the letters/numbers inside the box were very messily organized and a bit cluttered, so in order to find what I need to spell my message, I have to dump everything out and sift through the piles. Minor dislike though, all things considered.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice board with lots of letters, organization box and a display stand. I will give it 4 for that. I marked it down a star because: 1) I received gray instead of black...not sure of that is on amazon or the brand. 2) a lot of the letters have tabs on the bottom from taking them off the plastic. They come pre-removed, so it’s not because I did a bad job taking the letters off the form. (See picture) overall, I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kmorte100

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, but the quality isn't quite there
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous set. The letters aren't clipped very closely, so you may want to use a pair of snips or dog nail clippers to clip off the remaining sprue bits. The letters didn't come organized in the container, either. They were just kind of jumbled together. Still a great deal. EDIT: After working with this awhile, I've lowered my rating. The letters fall out of the board too easily, and since I had to clip the sprue remainders on each letter, I'd rather have had them on the sprue at a cheaper price. Then I could have clipped them into groups and kept them organized. As it is, the characters come jumbled together, and organizing them is time-consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Jensen

customer_reviews.title: You will put the letters, etc. in order on your own.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three sets of the 10x10” boards and I’m so glad I did. One for myself and two for gifts. The quality of this beautifully crafted felt letter board is miles beyond my expectations. The wood box for the massive amount of letters, numbers and symbols, and the sturdy wood frame are made with careful precision. I think everyone should have one of these boards in their home. They’re fun to play with. My photo is a quote that my husband said about his three boys. See? Fun.
customer_reviews.author: H. Pangloss

customer_reviews.title: Best letterboard you will find
customer_reviews.text: Wow! The best value I have EVER gotten for my money! I wanted a letterboard for some birthday photos shoots I was doing with my boys and decided to search Amazon for a good price. Needless to say I was shocked to receive this beautiful box filled with a board, an easel, a well-made, sectioned box containing all the letters, numbers and symbols, a canvas drawstring bag and a lovely thank you note. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Super cute, very good quality. I had bought a similar one at target one day, got home and it was missing a ton of letters, and when trying to put the letters on the board the frame fell apart. This one arrived very quickly, it arrived in very cute packaging, and they seller even added two cute little notes in the package thanking me for my purchase. The board is very sturdy, the letters are very well made. Love it! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality and very nicely packed. Has lots of letters and symbols all different sizes to best fit what you need. You can use it as a table display or hang on a wall, its prepared for both scenarios. The Back where you put the letters on is NOT plastic, its a smooth and nice type of fabric, very soft. Recommend this to anyone, its very well priced for the amount of things it brings. Hope this post helped you make a decision on this tem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every star
customer_reviews.text: This came in such a cute package. Includes a wooden box for sorting. I was extremely happy to see that I didn’t have to cut out each letter, they did that for me. However they were poorly sorted and it was very time consuming to resort the letters and numbers but I would rather sort letters than have to cut them out. This way you can sort them how you like. It came with a sorting guide that I followed and changed just a bit for my own liking. The board is well made, the letters fit well! It will get a lot of good use.
customer_reviews.author: Rchl

customer_reviews.title: Great vendor, great presentation, letters don't stay very securely.
customer_reviews.text: This vendor is incredible. They sent me a replacement board without any issues when the first arrived damaged. They also sent me a duplicate set of letters when I inquired how to buy supplemental matching letters for the board. Everything is packaged really nicely, as well. The only issue is that the channels the letters slot into are a little too wide to hold letters securely. Not a problem if you don't need to change it much or are going to display it on the stand and not straight up and down. Anything that gets handled much will provide some frustration.
customer_reviews.author: M. C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Nice letter board and letters. The letters are higher quality than the last set we bought from hobby lobby. Three sizes are nice and we haven't yet found that we needed additional letters of any size. Only complaint is that the symbols are weird. These are a lot of strange emoji type things when they could have just given more arrows and stars. The symbols are not consistant between sizes either. I also liked that the set includes scissors for trimming the tabs off the letters. It's a small thing, but a nice touch. The scissors are pretty nice, so one day they will probably get stolen from the kit for another use.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Letters fall off random assortment of letters, some without duplicates
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this board for pregnancy updates. I spent over an hour looking for this symbol “-“ to do dates written like this, 6-10-19. I only found ONE! Frustrating. Then I put the whole board together and as soon as I stood it up 15% of the letters fell off. I have another board from a different brand, and I realized the quality of this one was really poor. I’m disappointed because it was a good price, but I need a board I can stand up and hold without letters falling off. In the numbers there aren’t duplicates. So if you need 22 or 33 you’re just out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter Board
customer_reviews.text: This letterboard was packaged nicely and I was so excited when I opened it and found all the goodies for such a reasonable cost. It came with a 10" letterboard, easel, 3 sizes of letters and a nice wooden box to house the letters. Not to mention the tons of differnt symbols, emoji's, and other characters included. This letterboard is a STEAL!! If you weren't sure which one to buy, choose this one...you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Klar

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I received a letter board and I had trouble getting the letters to stick. I was disappointed as it was a gift for a friend and didn't realize until I tried to put a birthday message on it. I contacted Little Hippo and they promptly sent me a new set completely free and gave me a small refund. The replacement board and letters are awesome. They stick perfectly and there are so many fun sizes and cute accents. It is truly a well thought out product of great value if you compare to other companies and what is provided. I will be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Terri davis

customer_reviews.title: Meh, nothing impressive.
customer_reviews.text: Only giving three stars- the box states scissors were included, but they were not. The letters were pre-cut, but the organizer key is useless because they are all mixed around in the box they came in. Some of the pre-cut letters were not cut correctly, so I had a few letters that wouldn't even fit into the board and lay right. It's okay for what i bought it for, but i was expecting much more with all the positive reviews this received.
customer_reviews.author: AleciaEv

customer_reviews.title: Get's the job done but not greatest quality.
customer_reviews.text: The felt board does the job but I do wish they would take a bit more care in their product. The letters were already pre-cut and in the container but were not organized in any way so it took forever to find the right letters. You still have to cut the nibs off too. The actual board had loads of sawdust on it and is impossible to remove it all. A small bag is included that i'm not sure exactly what it's for but is falling apart. Frame on the felt board has some slivers. It does work just fine but if I would pay a bit more to get higher quality if I were to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Try a different one!
customer_reviews.text: The board was study and a great size. However, the letters are COMPLETELY mixed together. I cannot find any letter that I need for the life of me. It came with a pamphlet showing where each letter was, but it is a lie. All of the letters were completely mixed in mine and I haven’t been able to use my board cause I can’t find anything I need rendering this thing useless. I wouldn’t gift this to anyone simply because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G

customer_reviews.title: Love To Organize!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love the Pink! Pairing this with my Rae Dunn displays makes this choice so much more fun! Being able to choose between small letters and big letters are also a great option to have, so many choices on symbols makes it hard to decide what to write! Let’s talk about the organization box that comes with it, Omg!! How great is that? Once you get it all organized the way you want, your set forever! But no need to worry, it comes with a card so you can organize easily by following the card, I just like to do things my way :) Love this product and will definitely buy again for gift giving!
customer_reviews.author: Lora Seward

customer_reviews.title: Decent letter board, love the storage box.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size of the board. It brought many different size letters which I personally would have prefered 2 sizes. They provided big letters but they did not have the entire alphabet which was kind of upsetting. The scissors where alittle bent but worked. The easel fell on me 2 times but only because it needed to have the screw tightened. Once I tightened it, I had no issuees. The best part was the storage box, great size!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome letter board! All the letters are pre cut but they are not organized but I am so happy it comes with a really nice letter organizer! It also comes in such a cute box! You get way more than you pay for! I would 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little Hippo is a BIG deal!
customer_reviews.text: This letter board is everything I wanted and more! Excellent quality and a beautiful finish! More letters/numbers/symbols than I expected! That gives me even more possibilities for every occasion! The first one will be me and my fiancee's engagement session! The next will be my son's 5th birthday! Even he was excited to try it out, with me! The price was more than reasonable for all that I got! I'd recommend this to anyone! It would certainly make an excellent gift! Everything came well organized and there's even a pouch for extra organization!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This letter board is okay. The board itself seems pretty sturdy, but the rest was not great quality. Mine arrived already opened with pieces missing. The easel is terribly crooked and the letters were not organized in the wooden box. They also don’t stay in the board very well. I’d say if you can spend more money for a better one, do it. If you’re looking for cheap but decent, this will work.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Love

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it’s not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super cute packaging! The organizing case is a major plus. I wish it actually held all the pieces though. They give you a separate bag for the months, and really hardly all the letters and symbols fit in the case in an organized way. I can’t figure it out, anyways. They give you a chart but I couldn’t get it to work without some of the sections overflowing. Some of the tabs to hold the pieces in are warped or uneven, making them look crooked. I’ve had to cut some of the tabs off the months to get it to attach. Overall though, for the price, with all the letters, symbols, and the case, I’m finding it definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Smith

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with this
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I rushed this order as I finally decide to enroll in a school for my daughter and wanted this board.. and it came broken and crooked... AND THE CUSTOMER service email doesn’t even work.. they made this special day a really disappointment. I also ordered grey and they gave me black.. just one thing after another
customer_reviews.author: JLO

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful packaging, SO MANY LETTERS!
customer_reviews.text: The organizing box is worth its weight in gold, though you do have to sort the letters out yourself. The easel needs tightening to stay upright and will fall over if you knock it around too much, but that can be fixed with a ribbon to help keep it from going too far out! The sign itself is BEAUTIFUL, the packaging it arrived in made me wonder if I had spent twice as much. It's a beautiful box, and everything inside was in wonderful condition. 11/10, I plan to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: October Kaai Santerelli

customer_reviews.title: Overall, good letter board
customer_reviews.text: Did the job. Packaged nicely aside from a decent amount of debris( saw dust?). The pieces came already punched out which was very helpful, but they either weren’t organized to begin with or maybe shifted during shipping. It took a while to get them all organized. Not all pieces fit into the board nicely and the pieces could use more teeth to keep them more secure in the board. Overall, many pieces and so far enough of each letter. Nice storage box.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Fun board for creative teens
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased this board so she could have it in her bedroom. At first, when we received it, there were a couple of letters that she wished she had more of - for example, there was only one large B in the package. This was despite the fact that most letters and numbers and symbols were very numerous. When we reached out to the seller, they immediately gave us a 10% refund and sent more letters. So she is very happy with this board and has it hung up in her room. Definitely a good choice for a creative teenager. Great seller to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality letter board with LOTS of letters
customer_reviews.text: Very cute board! Lots of letters and symbols, even the months! The wooden box with dividers to store the letters-isn’t super adequate to hold so many letters so I took out the dividers and used snack ziplocks to organize. Overall a very nice quality letter board delivered in a nice box.
customer_reviews.author: BellaBean

customer_reviews.title: Precut, NOT sorted
customer_reviews.text: The box and packaging were very nice! I was thrilled with the quality of the board and easle as well. The precut letters are priceless though. They even sent tiny scissors if I needed to trim them up. However, while they were sorted.... there was no rhyme or reason to what was where other than the largest letters were separated from the smaller. My daughter and I sorted them alphabetically, but the large letters are not sorted. There needs to be about 12 more spaces maybe? Overall, great item and very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home or office
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to put in my office. It was an instant hit and coworkers have all asked where they can purchase one. The felt board is sturdy and nice quality. The letters, numbers, and symbols come in a really nice wooden box and a small canvas bag. This would make a great gift for tweens/teens as well as my daughter has asked me for one for her room. Will purchase again as gifts for others.
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Custom Letterboard
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was so cute! I absolutely love it and it’s easy to put the letters on. It’s a little difficult to find the letters in the packaging container but that’s totally fine, you just need patience haha. I’ve always wanted one of these and I’m so happy I got one!
customer_reviews.author: Korin P

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love that this board not only includes 3 different sized letters but also a storage container to organize them all. I went through & trimmed them all right away & organized them. It does take awhile to do but I did it while watching tv & for the price, it wasn’t a big deal to me. I wasn’t a big fan of the wooden frame it came with. I ended up using a metal one instead that I like better but again for the price, I didn’t think it was a big deal to ditch the one it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Holly P.

customer_reviews.title: The most annoying thing I’ve ever spent too much time on
customer_reviews.text: This is the most frustrating experience I’ve had with something like this- it now lies in pieces after falling less than a foot while I was hanging it on the side of a cabinet. The pieces come in a complete mess and includes a semi snarky key for the letter organizer saying “for every minute spent organizing, an hour is earned.” I would have preferred to cut them myself so it wasn’t double the work to sort through and cut the stems off. The wood for the stand split so it couldn’t be tightened to hold the weight of the board thus me trying to mount it before it’s death. RIP in literal pieces
customer_reviews.author: Brit Loken

customer_reviews.title: “Precut” yes, but sorted no, and you’ll have to go back and cut all the little tags off anyway
customer_reviews.text: Great set, durable letters, I like the different sizes. Everything I need for cute letter boards. “Precut” sure, but not well. Tags left everywhere. Had to clip and file almost every single piece. And everything was NOT sorted. So I had to take out everything and resort. Would have been easier to just clip and sort myself off the mold trays. Comes with a cute box.
customer_reviews.author: BreezyBreeMurphy33

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the cheaper versions
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the cheaper version. I thought I needed 2, but the $16 version was horrible so I returned it. This one is sooooooo well worth the slightly higher price tag. It’s not just different letter sizes (what I thought when I bought it) in the cheap version the letters fall out because the felt is loose and the stand does not match the frame. The frame and felt look so much nicer (the letters are about the same quality to be fair, but the cheap version only has the tiny size).
customer_reviews.author: Kh22

customer_reviews.title: Great letter board product
customer_reviews.text: I a college professor and was looking for a great board since the wife said I needed to decorate. Read the reviews and ordered. The reviews were spot on. Great look, sturdy and I would give as a gift. Everyone in the office liked it. I would have selected a larger one if available. The quality and price is awesome. Will probably buy one for the home office or kitchen area. I highly recommend. The first one I bought on Amazon was flimsy and not worth the price; sent it back and bought an excellent item to meet my need.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Good Board / Horrible Scissors
customer_reviews.text: This a great letter board and the fact that it came with 3 different letter sizes is what set it apart from the rest for me. A couple of things to note: 1) The board stand is not of the greatest material. I had to sand it to prevent splinters. 2) The little trimming scissors are garbage. Don't bother with them. Just throw them out. The blades kept falling out while I was taking off the excess plastic tips, and it gashed my thumb.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Nice board, disappointing Storage box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great letterboard, I needed a second one for my daughter. However I ordered this one for the letter storage box as the other one I have is plastic and I wanted to put all the letters from both into this beautiful wooden box, so I was very disappointed when it came and didn’t have enough slots for all the letters of the alphabet. Most of them have to double up and they all came jumbled all over the show so I had to sit and sort the huge amount of letters, numbers and symbols.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Acar

customer_reviews.title: Quality board with nice wooden letter organizer box
customer_reviews.text: Cool little letter board. I got it to announce our pregnancy. love that it came with a variety of big and small letters and a nice wooden box with sections to organize all the letters. The only negative thing I would say is that it only came with one big letter V and I needed 2 for my sign haha but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: When the box arrive it was so nicely packaged, it came with clippers for some of the letters so that you can trim them yourself, as well as a container full of pretrimmed letters, numbers and symbols! You can tell just how good of quality you are getting from the box, they were even sweet enough to include a thank you card! I absolutely recommend this product to all of my family and friends and am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended to friends!
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. I have had zero experience with letter boards prior to this purchase so I was curious how well the letters would stick. I've had no issues attaching the letters to the board and love that this bundle comes with so many letters, shapes and emojis! Extremely cute packaging as well. I've just recommended this product to a friend. My only suggestion would be to make the easel larger - the board is a bit top heavy for the small wooden frame. I'm going to wire the legs in the back to keep the easel standing tall, however, so I don't really think it'll be much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This board is SO much fun! The item came packaged very well and I love that the letters were already separated and in a little organizer. I definitely need to go through and organize them by type of letter because it takes a long time to find the ones I need right now. The only things I did not like were the stand, it is very weak and slides down easily if not up against the wall and the amount of letters. I wish there more letters and less characters. I tried to spell out "Pizza" and I could not because there was only one Z. Otherwise, I love it and am happy with my purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Its high quality for cheap prices! Def way better than i ever expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our front desk at work. It is so adorable. I absolutely love it and get so many compliments on it from guests. I love how I did nit have to cut all the plastic pieces. They came just as u see them in the photo. The board is Very nice and the stand is nice ad sturdy. It's so easy to use and change the letters. They are nice plasic and not a cheap material. I highly recommend this item its super cute! And SOooo many letters of 3 different sizes and lots fun shapes and smily faces and stuff!
customer_reviews.author: mgrubbe85

customer_reviews.title: So much variety!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this set comes with full sets of letters in more than one size as well as cute shapes like stars, hearts, music notes, etc ... I don't like that I have to cut off little plastic bumps from each letter but they are nice enough to give you a sharp pair of shears to use for it. I also really like the box for the letters, it keeps everything organized and even the box it comes in is great to keep the board and everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Packaging and small touches make this the perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This letter board comes with all the basics and more! Two sets of letters and symbols (2 different sizes), a stand, a cinch bag, and a plastic sectioned storage case to store the letters...the case won me over immediately! But...the packaging was amazing! I know that sounds crazy, but sometimes packaging is everything and this was one of those times. The box itself was so pretty! When you open it, the personal touches - the thank you card, the follow card, the small file to make your letters look great - stand out! As a small business owner myself, I appreciate the effort that went into this and would highly recommend purchasing this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Shoepe

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great value! It’s very well made and even comes with a wooden box to keep the letters in. It was very inexpensive, too. I love that the letters are already punched out of the plastic thing. I got a different brand letter board in the past and it literally took hours to punch out all the letters. That alone is why you should buy this. And did I mention it comes with an easel, too? They thought of everything!
customer_reviews.author: L. Pett

customer_reviews.title: Love it! 100% would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this already!! I opened it as soon as I saw it was delivered! My only thing is, it says they already organize it for you. It’s not totally organized. They did cut the letters out, which is super convenient and takes away that tedious task. However, I will be taking alllll the letters out of the box to re-organize them so they make sense. Also, I did have to re-cut some of the pieces that had plastic pieces still hanging on the letters that prevented them from sitting properly. They provide good, sharp scissors though so it wasn’t a big deal! Overall, I’d purchase this again and recommend it to others!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Accurate description
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the board and accuracy of the color blue I picked. I dislike the pieces that you have to disassemble yourself like the days of the week. I broke Thursday, so I gave up on using those pieces. I also dislike there’s no letter “O“ and you have to use the number “0” (zero). I bought this product for the announcement of my second son and expecting to use it for other events for both my sons. Overall this product has enough characters for me to make use of what I need it for. It’s nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Letters don’t stay, stand slides flat
customer_reviews.text: The stand is not secure. It slides open. I will attach a small chain to keep it from falllong flat. The letters do not stay well; it’s as though the tabs are on the wrong area. The tabs are at the bottom of the letters and not the top, so they don’t hang, per se, they’re just kind of there. Monday was broken. Oh the irony. The beautiful box has a very flimsy lock that bent off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the announcement of our first child in September. When I got the package I was super impressed by how beautiful and expensive the product looked. It came in a really fancy box and inside the box included the letterboard, a stand, extra letters for dates, and the letter all organized in a really nice wooden box. I wasn’t really expecting something this nice and I’m thoroughly impressed. Can’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Yan and Justin

customer_reviews.title: This arrived in a beautiful box, very well packaged and includes everything as ...
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in a beautiful box, very well packaged and includes everything as listed. Looks like a gift, as another purchaser mentioned. I've been wanting one of these boards for a long time and have been watching prices on variations, however I'm completely satisfied with my decision on this one! Fair price for everything included, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: who knew I was buying a product I couldn't use until hours of work later because I had to cut all the tabs off the stupid letters.
customer_reviews.text: I still haven't even used this...who knew I was buying a product I couldn't use until hours of work later because I had to cut all the tabs off the stupid letters...seriously horrible quality in my opinion...not to mention the tool they send you falls apart constantly. In my opinion I paid way too much for this to have to cut out my own letters.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: In awe ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this board! It was packaged very nicely and a great price for what all is included. There are other boards out there with 500 less letters and a very dull frame that sell for more than this one (might i add that this one has a kickstand)!
customer_reviews.author: Sharpie9815

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: The 10"x10" letter board came on time and in cute packaging. There are A LOT of pre-cut letters/numbers/surprise shapes. I am planning to use at my son's high school graduation party and other events in the future. Thank you Little Hippo!!
customer_reviews.author: TuoDuo

customer_reviews.title: lots of letters!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal around $18. I mainly ordered this for the extra letters and variety of sizes. The board is decent, kind of lightweight but not bad. The letters are not organized at all and definitely need to be cleaned up with a razor or clippers. The wood organizer is nice. Definitely worth the price for all you get!
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Felt Board
customer_reviews.text: Bought this letter board to write messages in my home, as well as serve as a caption for first/last day of school. The letters were already punched out (I did trim some of them, but that was my person preference). The board, case, stand and letters feel quite sturdy. This set includes a lot of letters and symbols. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Top-quality and sturdy felt board!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this purchase! I have looked at several felt letter boards on various websites and ultimately the price of this for the size was what made me choose it. I couldn’t be happier with that decision. The board came in a beautiful box, packaged very carefully, complete with a thank you note and all! I honestly felt like I had made a purchase from a friend when I opened it. The care and love for what they make was evident. If you are looking for a wonderful and sturdy felt board in a kit either everything you need for a great price choose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Charisha S.

customer_reviews.title: So many quotes on a letterboard...
customer_reviews.text: I really like my letter board. It comes with a standing piece, small-big letters, numbers, emojis and symbols in a cute organizer. Very easy to mix and match to create whatever's on my mind. ♥️ The only thing I don't care for is it's very easy for the letters to fall off or not stick in place when it's in standing position. Otherwise, if handled with care, good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie L

customer_reviews.title: BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE & PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I jumped on the letter board (pun intended) haha! I love how this couple started this cute little sweet business! I love the logo, packaging, and the heart that must have gone into each and every case. Tim personally reached out to me to make sure I was enjoying my letter board. I said I was but I was missing a few letters... Not only did he refund my purchase but he also informed me that he would be sending me a new one free of charge. This is hands down the best service I have ever received. Completely exceeded my expectations and I will be recommending this product to everyone I know! 😊😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Sims

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several letter boards so far, and this one is BY FAR the best one! First of all, the letters were already separated and even organized into a cute plastic tray!! Then, the board itself is sturdy and looks great! The stand can actually hold the board without collapsing (have had this issue with other companies). Even the box it came in was adorable. HIGHLY reccommend buying this one!! Oh and the different sized letters are great!! Awesome product and beautiful attention to detail!!
customer_reviews.author: mcmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This product was wonderful. I can't believe how much I got for so little. The stand is a little flimsy, but the package presentation was beautiful and it comes with a lot of different font sizes and symbols. I really like the wood frame, it looks really classy compared to a lot of others I've seen floating around on line. All in all, I would say you get more than what you pay for, and for the same if not better quality than its competitors. I'm a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Laurence-Williams

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: So the board itself is fine. the letters&numbers are cut out but not sorted very well, only by size. AND I’m missing letters and numbers in each size. It’s super frustrating that now I have to go purchase MORE letters because you didn’t send them all. I paid EXTRA for this one and I should have just bought the cheaper version. :/ pretty sad about it.
customer_reviews.author: AdawnC

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a wedding, but we'll use it for lots of things!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to be a sign at the front of the hall for our wedding. Great quality, easy to place letters, and the letters are precut which saves a A LOT of time. many sizes of letters and lots of symbols and punctuation, too. Only downside is the letters are all mixed together in the holders so it could be a bit of pain to find letters. It's a difficult problem to solve, though, as you can't have a slot for each letter or the holder would be GIANT. esp with multiple letter sizes and different symbols. All in all, super happy with this purchase and will use it again in the future, I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: sweetdanger

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Value, Fantastic Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Right from the top, this was shipped super fast! Next, the packaging & presentation are absolute standouts (see photos). Every single item in the box has obviously been carefully designed & created. Everything is very high quality! I spent over an hour going through the 5,000 letter boards on Amazon. I’m SO glad I chose this one! Don’t look anywhere else, this small family owned businesses obviously cares about making their customers happy. HIGHLY recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This item does work for what I wanted. Some of the letters are a little small to handle and place. But you get alot of them. Mine seem to be in 2 or 3 different sizes. Love the organizer box it came with. And the little extra pouch. The stand needs work. Maybe a little strap to keep it from sliding. All and all I like this item and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Pepin

customer_reviews.title: This product is heavy!
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed when this package arrived at the door was that it was way heavier than I expected. My daughter-in-law asked for this letter board as a birthday gift. She is a teacher and can use it in her class, but she actually wanted it to document her progress through the IVF process she is going through. This box is literally STUFFED with .... well, stuff. She was very happy with it pointing out to us that similar products are not PRE-cut. And with 690 letters, numbers, words and symbols, that's a lot of PRE-cutting. She is very happy with this gift!
customer_reviews.author: J. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: OCD Compliant
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old son saw one of these boards in a sandwich shop and for 3 months he has been determined that Santa had to bring him this. He only had this and one other item on his list lol Of course, Santa delivered and he was ecstatic! I love that there is a divider box that holds all of the pieces and there are so many combinations. It is easy to use and the pieces have tabs that you tuck into the felt creases so you always have even lines.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Review for grey square letter board. Let me just first say. This is some of the best product packaging I have ever seen. It’s beautiful. I’m not one to usually care about those things but I really was impressed by the time and thought they put into how everything was arranged. Now for the product, it’s amazing. My husband was even impressed with what we got for the price. 10/10 would recommend to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but letters don't stay on
customer_reviews.text: So cute and was packaged really well - they included a wooden box to store all the letters and also had a guide where to find each letter/symbol. That turned out to be useless though, they were just jumbled up wherever. The letters do fall off super easily, even though I felt like I was putting them on pretty forcefully. Oh well, it looks nice and served its purpose for our pregnancy announcement. I just won't be using it for much else around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Product, and Branding!
customer_reviews.text: What I love:: -Love the organizer. -Love the size of the board -Love the packaging and presentation -Love the size options of the letters (3 sizes!!) -Love the "emojis" that come included -Love the easel for standing it on a table -Love Love Love that they send scissors with it What I dont love: -Having to trim every piece in -I feel the felt isn't tight enough, my letters fall off all the time! -The wood frame was splintered at the bottom and I had to shave a piece off that kept poking out Overall love it, and looking forward to using it at my craft fair next weekend!
customer_reviews.author: mike marsh

customer_reviews.title: Great, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this product. It came in a beautiful box over the boring Amazon packaging I have gotten used to. The board itself is nicer then I thought it would be. You get letters in three different sizes, and lots of different symbols, emojis and abbreviations. You get a nice plastic container with dividers to help keep things organized. The stand is fine not great, but certainly useable. Everything came packaged well and quickly. I would certainly buy again and send this as a gift to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make my dog's announcement photos, and I absolutely love it! The board is super sturdy and attractive and there are so many characters to choose from. At first I was worried about there not being enough letters, but so far so good! Very pleased! The only thing you have to look for is the easel does move a lot but you might have a better time placing it than I did with a wriggly puppy!
customer_reviews.author: TheZombieWoman

customer_reviews.title: I love the size and the packaging and extras
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and the packaging and extras. The only thing I don’t love are the letters. The tabs to keep the letters on the board aren’t long enough and fall off. Hopefully they will change the letters and this would be perfect!!! Update: I have to change my rating because I can’t use the letters. The tabs on them are too small. I’ll need to buy other letters
customer_reviews.author: Nat8808

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This cute board arrived and is so much better than the description and the reviews! Most of the reviews complained about having to cut the letters - which didn't bother me at all. I ordered this particular board because it said it came with a handy divided case to hold the extra letters. Well ... it came with the case, the letters were all separated and already in the case! It also has an easel, which I didn't see in the description. I'm now re-thinking where I want to put my board as my original plan is a little more out of the way than what will be fun. Super cute, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this board. It has so many sizes and configurations of letters/numbers/symbols. She spends a considerable amount of time going through all of her options and choosing what she wants to display. It is very satisfying for the reasonable price! If you enjoy supporting small business like I do, give this product a chance before you buy any others. It's high quality, but also helps a family business.
customer_reviews.author: Robenrox

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: The letter board came exactly as described. I am very pleased with the quality as well as the extra container to keep all of the letters and numbers in. The box that holds the numbers and letters did arrive with the latch broken, which is why I gave it 4 stars. Otherwise this is a perfect addition for any announcement/gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the “extras“
customer_reviews.text: This came with a ton of letters and numbers and symbols, which could have been great but everything was mixed together in the box. 3 different sizes of letters and numbers and characters. I don’t mind some organizing but this was a serious pain. The pieces do not stay on the board well at all, when propping the board multiple pieces fall. It’s great that it comes with a stand for the board and a box to keep the letters in but ultimately I don’t think this product was worth it for two reasons 1. Poor functionality 2. The multitude/mess of pieces
customer_reviews.author: AnnaB907

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I received this right before school started, and I was able to make my kids signs for the 1st day of school pictures. It was so easy to use, and I love that it comes with the letters already taken apart and stored in a cute little box! It also comes with little scissors to cut off any excess plastic that might be left on the letter. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend’s birthday. The quality is very good and I liked the letters being in the plastic container but they are only organized by letter size so you have to pull everything out and sort through it all to find the letters you need. I had issues with the board stand not tightening securely but the company got in touch with me right away and ended up sending me a new box. Very happy with the product and company. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen G

product_meta.title: Felt Letter Board 10x10 (Black) | +685 PRE-Cut Letters +Stand +UPGRADED WOODEN Sorting Tray! Letters Board, Letter Boards, letterboard, Word Board, Message Board, Letter Sign, Changeable
feature_bullets: ✅NOW WITH MULTI-SIZED LETTERS AND CURSIVE WORDS! Letterboards are for creativity, so while other letter boards restrict you on accessories, the popular Little Hippo Letterboard gives you MORE! 690 Characters… in LARGE AND SMALL! #WAAAT? Yes, 3 SIZED LETTERS! (1, 2, and ¾ Inches)! You’ll never be lost for words again and always deliver stand out quotes #likeaboss!

✅UPGRADED! PREMIUM PRECUT LETTERS: We heard you loud and clear – cutting 690 letters, characters, emojis, symbols, hashtags and punctuation takes forever! So we precut, and put everything into your FREE WOODEN SORTING TRAY! Anywhere else, you’d have to buy this separately. But not us! Because, it’s the little things that count #quotethat

✅THE GIFT GIVERS CHOICE: Your Letter Board Kit comes with an adjustable solid wood easel for display. Along with the FREE WOODEN Sorting Tray you also get a BONUS Canvas Pouch, and as you see, all in a beautiful gift box! Elsewhere, you’d pay a small fortune for fewer goodies. But not here, and that’s why we earned Amazon’s Choice.

✅CLEAN LINES, WELL-MADE: Obviously you don’t want glue chunks on your frame or flimsy corners. That’s why your new sign board is held together by sturdy Frame Joints and reinforced with thick, strong upholstery staples. While we’re not saying to throw your words off a tall building, we can promise you it’s the long-lasting quote board you were looking for.

✅LITTLE HIPPO #LOVE: You’ve seen our #instaworthy small boards on social media, and now it’s time for you to join the fun in your home, café, restaurant, or office. It’s risk free too, with our LIFETIME WARRANTY. So if you’re ready to start sharing your voice in the cutest (… but loudest) way possible, you’re ready for the Little Hippo “Big ‘n’ Small” Letterboard Kit, so order now.
